column5: BW That tells me that any purchases below 41 are a gift Further confirmation building of anxietyriskturmoil to drive the stock down for big boy accumulation If you havent bought now get ready for a huge case of FOMO The only thing worse than missing the boat is when that boat triples and you just cant push the button on the way up No brainer for a company who has identified over 100m savings and revenue that is projected to rise Costs down significantly coupled with revenue and margin rising I like the sound of that
